DOC.detailed_description: Phytonutrients regard play important role many health-related issue like : - Improvement redox balance - Anti-inflammatory effect - Prevention chronic disease like CVD , stroke , diabetes II , Alzheimer´s , AMD , certain form cancer - Beneficial effect human´s microbiome Therefore scientific interest whether product provide absorbable phytonutrients/phenolics vitamin support mechanistic explanation beneficial outcome observe past intake Juice Plus+® . GOAL To identify absorption kinetics bioavailability phenolic compound specific vitamin encapsulate Juice Plus+® powder MERITS - This study would reveal knowledge whether extent specific vitamins phenolic compound absorb , include absorption kinetics/metabolism . - Data study may provide support mechanistic argument beneficial clinical outcome observe publish past . ENDPOINTS - Absorption kinetics phenolic compound plasma - Bioavailability vitamins C , E , carotenoid plasma Absorption kinetics phytonutrients : - Open- , one-arm study , absorption kinetics 10 hour - 5 blood sample collection : baseline ( = 0 ) ; 1hr , 2hrs , 5hrs 10 hour intake 3 capsule - Wash-out food supplement dietetic foodstuff : 2 week - Wash-out phytonutrients : 48 hour baseline sampling , accomplish via phytonutrient-poor diet . Bioavailability vitamins C , E , A carotenoid : - Open- , one-arm study 8 week - 2 blood sample collection : baseline ( 2 week phenolic experiment ) 8-weeks - Wash-out food supplement dietetic foodstuff : 4 week , 2 week phenolics experiment + another 2 week Subjects : 20 healthy subject Graz region , meet inclusion criterion ( see underneath ) .
DOC.criteria: 20 healthy men woman , 2050 year old ; nonsmoker ; BMI > 20 und < 30 kg/m2 ; medication ; premenopausal ; normal dietary habit ( specific diet , meal , food component etc . ) ; adherence washout period . people meet inclusion criterion ; diet : subject consume > 4 serving fruit vegetable per day ; subject kind food allergy histamine intolerance ; highly trained subject ( > 5 train units/week ) ; woman menstrual dysfunction ; pregnancy alcoholic .
